generic.banner: The banner shows two colleagues in the office. On the right there are 6 icons that represent the services available: disabled access, parking, bar, canteen, defibrillator and ATM.
generic.selectBuildingManager: Select the Building Manager for the reference location.
generic.noSiteSelected: No location selected. Go back to "Location Management" and select a location.
generic.name: Name

services.addDescription: In this section you can associate the location you have chosen with the services you want. Click on the cards of the individual services to add them and continue with step 2.

attributes.label: Attributes
attributes.selectAttrToAdd: Select the attributes you want to add

availableServiceCards.siteServicesDescription: Browse the list of services of Enel offices around the world
availableServiceCards.siteActivitiesDescription: Browse the list of activities available at each Enel location
availableServiceCards.sitesManagementSubtitle: Select one of the locations you manage, associate a Building Manager and edit or enter services and activities
availableServiceCards.servicesAttributesManagementDescription: Enter the services and attributes to associate with the locations
availableServiceCards.adminStrenneDescription: Enter new gifts and manage existing ones.

sitesManagement.serviceUpdated: The service has been successfully updated.
sitesManagement.deleteServiceConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this service?
sitesManagement.deleteServiceSuccess: The service has been successfully deleted.
sitesManagement.deleteBuildingManagerConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove {{buildingManager}} from Building Manager for the {{site}} location?
sitesManagement.deleteBuildingManagerSuccess: The Building Manager has been successfully eliminated.
sitesManagement.addBuildingManagerSuccess: The Building Manager has been successfully added.

saManagement.title: Category/Service/Attribute Management
saManagement.subtitle: On this page, you can manage categories, global services and attributes
saManagement.newServiceDesc: Enter the name of the service you want to create and associate an icon among those available
saManagement.newAttributeDesc: Enter the name of the attribute you want to create and associate it with an icon among those available
saManagement.confirmServiceDelete: You are deleting the {{service}} service. Are you sure you want to proceed?
saManagement.confirmAttributeDelete: You are deleting the {{attribute}} attribute. Are you sure you want to proceed?
saManagement.selectIfAttachment: Select whether the attribute provides an attachment
saManagement.newCategoryDesc: Enter the name of the category you want to create
saManagement.confirmCategoryDelete: You are deleting the {{category}} category. Are you sure you want to proceed?

adminsManagement.title: Administrator Management
adminsManagement.subtitle: In this section you can make users administrators of Headquarters and entrust them with the management of the services and activities of one or more locations.
adminsManagement.addAdminDesc: Select a colleague to adminize and then select the locations they can manage.

booking.description: In this section you can view the list of your bookings for the activities that will be available in the various Enel offices

error.label: Error
error.generic: Sorry, an error has occurred. Please try again.
error.unauthorized: User {{user}} is not authorized to complete this operation.

success.label: Success
success.generic: The operation was carried out successfully.

strennaForm.subtitle: Verify and manage the list of Strenne and insert the newly received Strenne
strennaForm.delete: Are you sure you want to delete the Christmas gift?
strennaForm.reminderMessage: Are you sure you want to remind this user?
strennaForm.reminderMultiUserMessage: Are you sure you want to remind all selected users?
strennaForm.rejectMessage: Are you sure you want to reject this Strenna?

userStrenne.strenneManagementSubtitle2: In this section, you can manage the Christmas gifts received until January 13, 2024. Gifts not collected by that date will be donated to charity.!!If you are picking up a large item, you can temporarily park your car in the garage at Via Rubicone 24, where an attendant will be available to assist you.!!Once you have entered the gift management instructions through the 'Manage' button, they cannot be modified further. If there are legitimate obstacles to picking up the gift on the agreed date and time, please contact the Gift Office
userStrenne.strenneManagementSubtitle: In this section, you can manage the gifts received in accordance with policy number 299 "ɸGifts and Hospitalityɸ". You can decide whether to accept and collect them, reject them, or donate them to charity. Once one of these choices is selected and confirmed in the dropdown menu, it cannot be modified. If you are unable to collect the gift on the selected date and time, or if you wish to return it after collecting it, write to #omaggi@enel.com#! Gifts not collected by the date indicated in the received email will be *donated to charity*.
